name: Red And The Wolf (Demo)
description:
UPDATE: a BIG difference but still a demo

About The Game 

Red And The Wolf is a demo of a game created in Rpg Maker XP for Pixel Horror Jam 2017. 

The game is inspired by the classic fairy tale of Red Riding Hood and revolves around exploration of the dark forest the protagonist found herself in. Red is a young girl who came to visit her sick grandmother and got stuck in a very complicated situation. Her task is to survive in a forest full of unnatural aggressive animals and find her beloved grandma.

First made for Pixel Horror Jam 2017!

Made in Rpg Maker XP
